member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox
member.summary: Represents a list box with MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape objects.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ShapeListBox class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnMeasureItem(System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs)
member.summary: This member overrides ListBox.OnMeasureItem.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)
member.summary: This member overrides ListBox.OnDrawItem.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: This member overrides ListBox.OnKeyDown.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.AddShape(MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape)
member.summary: Adds a new shape to the end of the list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.AddShapes(MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape[])
member.summary: Adds the specified shapes to the end of the list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.AddShapes(MindFusion.Diagramming.ShapeCollection)
member.summary: Adds the specified shapes to the end of the list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.InsertShape(System.Int32,MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape)
member.summary: Inserts the specified shape at the specified position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.GetShapeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the shape at the specified index in the list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.SetShapeAt(System.Int32,MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape)
member.summary: Sets a new shape at the specified position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.RemoveShapeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the shape at the specified position of this list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ClearShapes
member.summary: Removes all shapes from the list box,

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ItemToShape(System.Object)
member.summary: ListBox Items collection does not contain ShapeTemplates directly, but an opaque object. To access the Shape object use method ItemToShape

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeToItem(MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape)
member.summary: The complement to ItemToShape. Could be used to insert a Shape object to the Items collection at a specified index. This does not search an existing item, but creates a new one without adding it to the Items collection.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.InvalidateShapeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Invalidate the specified Shape causing it to be redrawn. Call this when the shape changes

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnShapeSelected(MindFusion.Diagramming.ShapeEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the user selects a shape in this list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnShapeRenamed(MindFusion.Diagramming.ShapeEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the user changes a shape label in this list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnShapeRemoved(MindFusion.Diagramming.ShapeEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the user removes a shape from the list box.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This member overrides ListBox.OnSelectedIndexChanged.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Control.OnMouseDown override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Control.OnMouseMove override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.StartInlineEdit
member.summary: Initiate inline editing of the shape display name.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeSelected
member.summary: Raised when the user selects a Shape in the ListBox

member.name: E:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeRenamed
member.summary: Raised when the user renames a Shape in the ListBox

member.name: E:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeRemoved
member.summary: Raised when the user removes a Shape from the ListBox

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.DrawMode
member.summary: This property is overridden. Get is unchanged, set is ignored. Its value is always DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.IconMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal and vertical margins left around the shape icons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.IconSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the shape icons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.DefaultNodeSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the shapes that are created by dragging list box items to the diagram.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeFillColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill color of the shapes icons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifiers of all shapes available in the toolbar.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.Items
member.summary: For internal use.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeCount
member.summary: Gets the number of shapes in the list box.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.Shapes
member.summary: Gets or sets the shapes displayed in the list box.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.AllowRename
member.summary: Allow inline renaming of listbox items by pressing F2. Currently listbox displays shape ids as names

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.AllowRemove
member.summary: Allow deletion of listbox items by pressing Del. Only listbox items are deleted - not the source of shapes.
